body_html:
Yeah, automatic tensor promotion gets you most of the way there. The downside being you still have to deal with .data to convert back to tensors. But if torch ops accept tensors and variables interchangeably then you should rarely have to call .data either. There are some exceptions like dealing with single elements (python floats), or converting to numpy, etc.

I'm happy with #274 as a solution. @colesbury ?

body:
Yeah, automatic tensor promotion gets you most of the way there. The downside being you still have to deal with `.data` to convert back to tensors. But if torch ops accept tensors and variables interchangeably then you should rarely have to call `.data` either. There are some exceptions like dealing with single elements (python floats), or converting to numpy, etc.

I'm happy with #274 as a solution. @colesbury ?
